document_data.name: Arkaneus Silvermane
document_data.languages: [[Common]], [[Druidic language|Druidic]], [[Centaur language|Centaur]], [[Dryad language|Dryad]], [[Elven language|Elvish]], [[Gnome language|Gnomish]], [[Jotunhaug|Hill Giant]], [[Lizardfolk language|Lizardfolk]], [[Manticore language|Manticore]], [[Sprite language|Sprite]], [[Treant language|Treant]], [[Draconic language|Green Dragon]], [[Halfling language|Halfling]], [[Dwarvish]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Arkaneus Silvermane''' was the [[Archdruid]] of [[Mosstone]] and a member of the [[Company of Eight]] in [[Tethyr]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Abilities:
Arkaneus knew how to fight with hammer, [[dagger]], and [[Quarterstaff|staff]]. He could ride horses and knew healing techniques and how to tell the weather.

Arkaneus was a polyglot, speaking a large number of languages, including such rare languages as the tongue of [[manticore]]s and several dialects of [[Sylvan]].

He was one of the most powerful members of the Company of Eight.
document_data.Personality:
Despite his great druidic powers, Arkaneus always adopted a low profile, rarely intervening during heated discussion between his companions. His patience extended to all areas of life.

He had never maintained a single absolute point of view of things but changed according to facts, being a cool and rational decision-maker without emotional attachment. Arkaneus believed his service in the Company was a means to confer balance to the chaos of his country.
document_data.Relationships:
Arkaneus was attended by three apprentice druids, the married couple [[Leisha]] and [[Thastrun]], who were devoted to the care of [[Cayr Thalwood]], and [[Manfred Arbustle]], who in [[1357 DR]] joined the Company. He had great faith in Manny and trusted that he would find his way despite his struggles and would one day became his successor.

Arkaneus felt a close bond of friendship with those in the Company of Eight. Because of his coolness under pressure, [[Tardeth Llanistaph]] relied on him for good advice.
document_data.Possessions: Arkaneus' primary weapon was his ''[[Staff of the Woodlands]]'', but he also carried some throwing daggers and a hammer. He wore [[leather armor]].
